mapper.select: select f_id, f_name, f_real_name, f_sex, f_passwd, f_email,f_phone from t_user where f_name = #{name} and f_passwd = #{passwd}
select f_id, f_name, f_real_name, f_sex, f_create_time, f_email,f_phone from t_user
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (f_id, f_name,f_real_name, f_sex, f_passwd,f_email,f_phone,f_create_time) values(replace(uuid(), '-', ''), #{user.name}, #{user.realName}, #{user.sex}, #{user.name}, #{user.email}, #{user.phone},now())
mapper.update: update t_user set f_real_name=#{user.realName}, f_name=#{user.name}, f_sex=#{user.sex}, f_passwd=#{user.name}, f_email=#{user.email}, f_phone=#{user.phone} where f_id=#{user.id}
